Articles.Content: I think it would be a great idea to implement a learning system in the mission control building were after you launch a rocket and successfully get it were its going the Mission control building is used to reconstruct flights and able to program it into a computer core. The cores could be tied with the Tech tree so that the better probe core you have the more Mits of data it can hold for more or less complicated maneuvers. Also Kerbals could be trained with new Equipment unlocked from the Tech tree and learn how to pilot or accomplish Planned commands from mission control.
